name: csv-stringify
description: CSV stringifier implementing the Node.js `stream.Transform` API

scripts.preversion: rm -rf lib/*.js && npm test && grep '## Trunk' CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version: version=`grep '^  "version": ' package.json | sed 's/.*"\([0-9\.]*\)".*/\1/'` && sed -i "s/## Trunk/## Version $version/" CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.coffee: coffee -b -o lib src && cd lib && babel *.js  -d es5 && cd ..
scripts.pretest: coffee -b -o lib src && cd lib && babel *.js  -d es5 && cd ..
